title: Repo rate left unchanged at 6.5%, decision taken unanimously; Inflation a big risk
selftext:
The Reserve Bank of India will not hike its lending rate (repo rate), in-line with consensus expectations of market watchers and economists. The repo rate will remain unchanged at 6.5%, as announced in the August policy.   
[Here's all you need to know](https://www.cnbctv18.com/economy/rbi-mpc-meet-2023-policy-rates-left-unchanged-stance-shaktikanta-das-inflation-gdp-risk-17967741.htm) ðŸ‘ˆ
